Dawn-Lyen Gardner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dawn-Lyen_Gardner 0 Dawn-Lyen Gardner (born August 30, 1981) is an American actress. She is best known for her leading role in the Oprah Winfrey Network drama series, Queen Sugar. Dawn-Lyen_Gardner ( born August_30 , 1981 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_leading_role in the_Oprah_Winfrey_Network_drama_series , Queen_Sugar .
